MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Sound Lane, Sound Heath, Wrenbury Heath Road and surrounding streets. It was  necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:15pm to repair the network following a grounded overhead line. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the complexity of the repair. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.46pm on 1st February 2021.
